description: Executive-level CTO strategy analysis focused on technology direction, vendor positioning, risk, and multi-year roadmap alignment to business outcomes.

structure.constraints: List regulatory, security, budgetary, operational, and legacy constraints that shape viable options.
structure.strategy: Describe the recommended strategic approach, including guiding principles and architectural direction.
